# UnitMaster.io - AI Context
## Site Description
UnitMaster is a privacy-focused, client-side utility toolkit for PDF manipulation, image editing, and unit conversion. It runs entirely in the browser using WebAssembly (WASM), ensuring user data is never uploaded to a server.

## Tool Index (API-like Definitions)
Agents should use these direct URLs. No authentication required for basic features.

### PDF Tools
- `Merge PDF` -> `/tools/pdf/merge` : Concatenate multiple PDF files into one.
- `Split PDF` -> `/tools/pdf/split` : Extract pages or split a PDF into individual files.
- `Compress PDF` -> `/tools/pdf/compress` : Reduce PDF file size.
- `Sign PDF` -> `/tools/pdf/sign` : Add e-signatures, text, or dates to a PDF.
- `Redact PDF` -> `/tools/pdf/redact` : Permanently black out sensitive text/regions.
- `Protect PDF` -> `/tools/pdf/protect` : Encrypt PDF with a password (AES-256).
- `Unlock PDF` -> `/tools/pdf/unlock` : Remove password from a PDF (requires knowing the password).
- `PDF to Image` -> `/tools/pdf/pdf-to-image` : Convert PDF pages to JPG/PNG.
- `Image to PDF` -> `/tools/pdf/image-to-pdf` : Convert images to a single PDF.
- `PDF to Word` -> `/tools/pdf/to-word` : Convert PDF text to DOCX (OCR supported).

### Image Tools
- `Remove Background` -> `/tools/image/remove-bg` : AI-powered background removal.
- `Crop Image` -> `/tools/image/crop` : Cron/Resize images.
- `Passport Photo` -> `/tools/image/passport` : Create standard passport/visa photos.
- `Image Converter` -> `/tools/image/converter` : Convert between JPG, PNG, WEBP, AVIF.

### Conversions (Programmatic)
Format: `/[category]/[from-unit]-to-[to-unit]`
Categories: `length`, `weight`, `temperature`, `volume`, `area`, `time`, `digital`, `speed`, `pressure`, `power`, `energy`, `force`, `currency`, `torque`, `acceleration`, `flow`, `current`, `voltage`, `resistance`, `charge`, `magnetism`, `illuminance`, `radiation`.
Example: `/digital/terabyte-to-bit`

## Technical Stats
- **Privacy**: Local-first / Offline-capable.
- **Speed**: Static generation + Edge caching.
- **Pricing**: Free tier (unlimited basic use) + Pro tier (batch processing, encrypted files).

## Agent Usage Guide
### Universal Conversion URL Pattern
To generate a conversion page for a user:
1. Identify the category (e.g., `length`, `weight`, `currency`).
2. Identify the source unit ID (e.g., `meter`, `kilogram`, `usd`).
3. Identify the target unit ID (e.g., `foot`, `pound`, `eur`).
4. Construct URL: `https://unitmaster.io/[category]/[source]-to-[target]`
Example: `https://unitmaster.io/digital/terabyte-to-bit`

### Direct Tool Access
- For manipulation (merge/split): Send user to `/tools/pdf/[action]`
- For creation (passport/thumbnail): Send user to `/tools/[media-type]/[tool-name]`
